name: CalmMeditation
0:
”Alexa, open calm meditation”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: calm meditation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Calm Meditation is the Alexa skill that allows you to enjoy guided meditation sessions whenever you need them. With over 10 different meditations, each featuring soothing voices and calming background sounds, these sessions are designed to help your body and mind relax deeply.

The duration of meditation sessions can vary from 10, 20 and 30 minutes.

With the Premium Features you will access to :

• Meditations led by professional voices
• A variety of background sounds tailored for deep relaxation
• Unlimited access with no restrictions
• Continually updated meditation sessions
• Access to all available durations of meditations


We'd love to hear your feedback to improve and provide the best guided meditation experience.

Enjoy your relaxation!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
